content: olive you too yarn dream in color classy olive you too is a classic cardigan for any boy or girl needle 7 us 4 50 mm or what you need to get gauge 6 us 4 00 mm this is knit top down with an offset button front cable gauge 20 0 stitches = 4 inches panel yardage 200 275 350 450 sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-18 months chest measurements 16 18 19 21 notions 4 4 4 5 buttons ¾ or 1 size page 1 knit on the rs purl on the ws ▬ purl on the rs knit on the ws c4f slip 2 stitches onto a cable needle and hold in the front knit 2 then from the cable needle knit 2 t3f slip 2 stitches onto a cable needle and hold in the front purl 1 then from the cable needle knit 2 t3b slip 1 stitch onto a cable needle and hold in the back knit 2 then from the cable needle purl 1 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 20 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 19 note starting on row 6 you will work ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 18 the cable section down the front to the hem keep the first 4 and last 4 stitches in seed stitch ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 17 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 16 ws - wrong side rs - right side ▬ ▬ 15 yo - yarn over sm- slip marker ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 14 pm1 - place marker 1 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 13 pm2 - place marker 2 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 12 p2tog- purl two stitches together ▬ ▬ 11 rm remove marker ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 10 kfb - knit into the front and back of ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 9 the stitch ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 8 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 7 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 6 pm1 to mark the raglan increases ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 5 pm2 to mark the centered cable ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 4 section ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 3 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 2 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 1 14 13 12 11 10 90 80 70 60 50 40 30 20 10 cast on 51 53 57 59 stitches using a long tail cast on and the smaller cable section needles row 1 rs purl 1 knit 2 purl 2 c4f purl 2 knit 2 purl 1 row 1 ws knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 row 2 ws knit 1 purl 2 knit 2 purl 4 knit 2 purl 2 knit 1 row 3 rs purl 1 knit 2 purl 2 knit 4 purl 2 knit 2 purl 1 row 2 rs knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch
